body.p: Kentucky adjutant general and attorney. Illinois native. Educated in the law and admitted to the bar. Practiced law in Buck Township, Edgar County, Illinois in 1860. Married to Jennie Looney Boyle. Lieutenant colonel in the Ninth Kentucky Cavalry from 1862 to 1863. Served as adjutant general of Kentucky from September 1863 to August 1864. At the end of the war, moved to St. Louis, Missouri and practiced law.
